snippet: The Chinese are trying to stem the flow of disaffected Tibetans fleeing to Nepal and to enlist the help of the Nepalese in cracking down on the political activities of those already there.
abstract: China is providing financial aid and sending military officials to Nepal in hopes of enlisting government's help in reducing number of disaffected Tibetans fleeing to that country and cracking down on political activities of those already living there.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese are trying to stem the flow of disaffected Tibetans fleeing to Nepal and to enlist the help of the Nepalese in cracking down on the political activities of those already there.

headline.seo: China Makes Inroads in Nepal, Stemming Tibetan Presence
headline.main: China Makes Inroads in Nepal, and Stanches Tibetan Influx
headline.print_headline: China Makes Inroads in Nepal, And Stanches Tibetan Influx
